text:
[Verse]
Morning sun on my face
Morning light warm embrace
Coffee cup in my hand
Simple things make me grand

[Verse 2]
Walking down city streets
Every step feel the beat
People smile wave and greet
Life is good feeling sweet

[Chorus]
Oh it's just the little things
Spread my arms let me sing
All the joy that they bring
Yeah it's just the little things

[Verse 3]
Raindrops fall on my head
Dancing on my own instead
Worries fade leave me free
In these moments I can see

[Bridge]
Stars light up in the sky
Dreams take flight let them fly
Whispers of the night air
Happiness everywhere

[Chorus]
Oh it's just the little things
Spread my arms let me sing
All the joy that they bring
Yeah it's just the little things
title: The Little Things
